name: SV Discount Progress Bar
author: Pavel Ketov

sections.description:
The plugin allows WooCommerce users to install a discount progress bar on their website to provide cumulative discounts.
A cumulative discount is a discount that grows with the amount spent: the more you buy, the higher the discount.
The plugin shows clients an attractive indicator at the bottom of the site, thereby informing in advance that when buying a product for a certain amount, the client will receive a discount in accordance with the plugin settings.

Demonstration of the plugin using a live example

Demonstration works for Storefront & WooCommerce.

  • Demo: SV Discount Progress Bar
sections.faq: Cumulative discount, the amount of which directly depends on the amount spent: the more you buy, the higher the discount.
sections.changelog:
1.2.2

  • Fix : Backward incompatibility with php 7.0

1.2.1

  • Fix : Small bug related to php 8

1.2.0

  • Add : Preview the progress of the bar in real time when changing the style settings

1.1.0

  • Add : Plugin settings
    • Link
    • Link text
    • Show / Hide prices on mobile
  • Fix : CSS rendering on mobile
  • Message : For those who already have version 1.0.0 installed, for correct operation you need to re-save all settings

1.0.0

  • First release
